name: Skeletal Warhorse
description: A large skeletal horse with impressive strength and agility, serving as a formidable mount for necromancers.
memorable: The charging ability that can knock opponents prone adds a unique tactical element to combat.
goals: To serve its necromancer or undead master in battle.
relations: Often found alongside necromancers or in undead hordes.
environment: Typically found in graveyards, battlefields, or areas tainted by undeath.
strengths: High Strength score allowing for powerful attacks and a fast movement speed for quick positioning.
attacks: Hooves attack that can knock opponents prone with a successful charge.
most_powerful_ability: Charging attack that can knock enemies prone, creating battlefield control.
additional_information: Functions without air, food, or sleep due to Undead Nature.
Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
test_queries: skeleton horse that charges and knocks prone
undead creature with powerful hoof attacks
